features: 100% Pure and Natural: Majestic Pure products are 100% pure and natural. This means they are free from toxins, additives, or any nasty chemicals. Completely unfiltered and undiluted for the best result

Nutritious Hair care: Detoxify and give your hair the cleanse it needs after a rough day with Majestic Pure Apple Cider Vinegar Shampoo. It helps dispose of scalp build-ups and works towards bringing back your natural shine

Tame that Frizz: Getting your frizzy hair in control is a very tedious task, but this shampoo will help ease that process, all thanks to its moisturizing ingredients that keep your hair hydrated and smooth

Complete Nourishment: If you need assistance in keeping dandruff at bay, strengthening your roots, and getting that pesky scalp out of your life for good, then this Apple Cider Vinegar Shampoo should be your go-to choice

Easy & Quick Pump Out Bottle: Majestic Pure Apple Cider Vinegar Shampoo comes inside an easy-to-pump bottle. A single press on top and your shampoo will squeeze out quickly and easily, giving you the exact amount you require with no spillage

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Majestic Pure Apple Cider Vinegar Shampoo is formulated with nourishing ingredients to promote healthy hair and scalp. It is sulfate free. Gentle enough for daily use and for all hair types. Majestic Pure Apple Cider Vinegar Shampoo is light, won’t weight your hair down. Contains raw Apple Cider Vinegar, Coconut Oil, and Avocado Oil to clarify and hydrate hair and scalpColor protect shampoo and conditionerSulfate freeFor all hair types, especially for dry, damaged hair Click the button at the top of this page to buy with confidence.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this shampoo. My hair feels so healthy and clean after each shampoo. It smell fresh and leaves my hair without that filmy feeling you get from other shampoos. I buy this on a regular basis.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this! Great for moisture and my hair grows so fast. Very healthy after using this. Smells good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Helpful on my Natural Thick Hair Journey
reviews.reviewText: A little background about me and my hair. My ethnicity gives me extraordinarily thick, slightly coarse, dense dark brown hair. I'm a strong believer in everything natural and fewer harmful chemicals. Striking a balance between what I consider beauty and keeping the ingredients natural has been a challenge. This shampoo gets my stamp of approval ,for the most part. The first two bottles I got worked well and smelled good, I was looking for something without silicone so I could try the curly girl method. The current bottle I have still seems to " clean"fairly well, maybe not quite as well. What I don't like about it is a strong acetone like odor that's some other reviewers have pointed out. My husband says it smells like apple cider vinegar though and I don't completely trust my own nose at times. Post-covid I think we should all question our sense of smells. Since smell hallucinations was a feature of that disease. I like that this cleans my hair but doesn't strip all the natural oils. Isn't too heavy, and since I'm not going for the Uber-hippie unwashed look, still makes me feel presentable and professional. I have no issue with the pump that comes with it. The ingredients list is slightly deceptive because vinegar and fruit extract are listed separately while the front claims that it's raw apple cider vinegar. However that's not a deal-breaker since I also purchase separately good raw apple cider vinegar to use on my hair as a conditioner and to remove mineral deposits from hard water. After an apple cider vinegar rinse my hair is always lighter fluffier and softer. I'd recommend it if you like more natural products: but remember if your hair is fine or different than mine you will not get the same results that I did.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It definitely clean well
reviews.reviewText: I have trouble finding shampoos that clean my fine, delicate normal hair, plus the finer delicate grey hair. This product seems to do a wonderful job. It has also been working well the the cream rinses that I have to use because of my hair being so fine and delicate. In 50 years, I have never found one company that does both products to my satisfaction. This sampoo is a winner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I have straight, thick, coarse, gray/silver unprocessed hair. I developed an itchy scalp acne issues over the hot, humid summer. I started using this product a few months ago, at first it really helped relieve the itch and scalp acne. As I continued to use this product, regularly, I noticed my hair began shedding excessively after use and the scalp itch and acne returned with a vengeance. I was only using Majestic ACV shampoo without any conditioners. My scalp became so sensitive and painful with breakouts that it hurt to touch my head. I stopped use of this ACV shampoo for a few weeks while I started using a shampoo bar that did not contain any SLS, silicone, or palm oil and all of the scalp problems resolved quickly. This was my experience. I will continue to use the shampoo bar and stop paying for questionable ingredients and plastic containers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Your next favorite hair care routine
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely amazing value for your buck! Comes in an easy to use bottle, nice and smooth gentle texture that leaves your hair smelling and looking so much healthier! I highly recommend it!!!
